main event: Several witnesses reported sightings of pulsating and glowing lights in Coursegold, California on October 9, 1962.
interesting points: Witnesses observed lights that changed colors between reddish, amber, and green,Some witnesses reported sightings of similar objects as early as the fall of 1960, but increased reports were noted over the last three weeks,One witness described a vertical ascent of the object at a very rapid speed,Other witnesses included neighbors and a school teacher who communicated through citizen band radio,Descriptions of the object did not match any known aircraft activity.
witness description: Intelligent, calm, mature persons capable of lucid description of objects sighted
